name: Reacher Grabber - Mobility Aid
description: Client is wheelchair bounded due to Lupus disease. Her reacher has spoilt and would need reacher to pick up items.

name: Electric Scooter
description: Elderly man requires portable electronic scooter due to his legs being weakened  after decades of damage from kidney transport, swelling and also having blood clots.

name: PMD Mobility Scooter
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: electric wheelchair
description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: diapers of size XL and XXL
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapes.

 

We would like to seek donations for diapers of size XL and XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs due to family struggling with financial issues. Your kindness is much appreciated.

contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

Requesting halal food rations for needy families who may not have money to buy food Items due to financial issues

name: E-Bike
description: A family of 3 with a young child aged 3 requires an e-bike to work as a food delivery person. Currently, they have one e-bike but would require another one so that both husband & wife can work full time.

name: Foldable Bicycle
description: A female young adult living in a rental flat. She has poor family support and is receiving assistance for her finances and emotional needs. Her desire is to minimise expenses and would like to receive a foldable bicycle, so that she can cycle to work and save on transport costs. A donation of this bicycle would be highly appreciated. Thank you.

name: Request for TPG compatible mobile phone for elderly please
description:
Client is a 72 year old elderly who lives in rental housing. She is currently in between job and makes many calls for job search purposes. As a result, she has been topping up approximately $30-$40 a month to her prepaid card which is quite costly to her. She heard about TPG and has signed up for the $10 per month plan in hope to reduce her expenses. 

Her current phone is not TPG compatible. As such, she needs to use the TPG app to make calls, in which she has difficulty accessing which limits her call making.

Client hopes to be able to self-reliant and continue working as she is still in good general health. Hence, she hopes to have a TPG compatible phone which she is unable to afford due to her unemployment and limited savings. Thank you very much for your consideration and attention!

name: Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr C was recently discharged from hospital due to a wound injury. He lives alone and his house is currently undergoing decluttering. His case worker has arranged for Home Personal Care, but his washing machine has broken down.  
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a washing machine, which will enable our Health Care Assistants to assist him in his laundry.  
     
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony Wang at 9654 6542. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s place at Ang Mo Kio Ave 5. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

Their fridge recently broke down and this will impact their food supplies given that they consume a lot of frozen food items. As the family is from a Muslim family, the family hopes to receive a Muslim owned fridge if is a used one. 

The assistance with a fridge will be greatly appreciate. Thank you! (Ruth)

description:

Diapers- Huggies - Nature made (L size)
Enfamil A+ stage 2

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Kee Ru Wei

name: Pedia Sure Gold Strawberry flavour
description: Client is requesting for Pedia Sure Gold (Strawberry flavour) milk powder for her granddaughter whom she is caring for. They are living in a rental flat and has financial support but is not able to purchase the retail item for the granddaughter's needs.

name: MamyPoko diapers
description: Client is requesting for XL Mamypoko diapers for her granddaughter whom she is caring for. They are living in a rental flat and has financial support but is not able to purchase the retail item for the granddaughter's needs.

name: Wardrobe
description: Ct is a 30 year old housewife staying with her 65 year old husband and 1 year old daughter. Husband is the sole breadwinner earning approx. $600/month and his income is not fixed. Hb works long hours while Ct is the main caregiver. The family is facing challenges in parenting.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bukit Panjang
contact.name: Nur Ashikin Binte Hazlan

name: 3-seater sofa
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) currently sleeps on a wooden sofa bench without cushions, that has since broke in his living room.

   

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a 3-seater sofa (non-fabric material, light-coloured) for the elderly to sleep on. Non-fabric material is preferred for easier maintenance. Light-coloured is for easier monitoring of pests (if any).

   

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to client’s home directly at Macpherson lane. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Queen Size bed with mattress
description: Client suffers from multiple chronic health issues and is currently unfit for work. Client has 2 active school-going children and requires new furniture to meet her children's growing needs. Due to financial constraint, would appreciate that delivery fee to be covered by donor.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Yong Jia Chiu

name: Wardrobe with sliding door
description: Client suffers from multiple chronic health issues and is currently unfit for work. Client has 2 active school-going children and requires new furniture to meet her children's growing needs. Due to financial constraint, would appreciate that delivery fee to be covered by donor.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Yong Jia Chiu

name: DOUBLE DECKER BED WITH MATTRESS
description: We are appealing for a DOUBLE DECKER BED WITH MATTRESS for a lw ince family with 6 yond children whose parent is suffering from ill health the item will give the kids a better sleeping arrangement WE SEEK THE DONOR FUTHER ASSISTANCE FROM THE DONOR TO ASSIST WITH THE TRANSPORTATION OR COVER THE TRANSPORTATION COST

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Bedroom storage cabinets with drawers
description: A single mother with 3 children required a bedroom Storage cabinet with 7 Drawers. Client and her children just shifted to new rental flat. Currently, client is working at Food Store.

name: Sofa
description: Single mother with 3 children is required a 3-seater sofa as she just shifted to new rental flat. Client is currently working at food store.

name: Recliner
description: Elderly man with multiple health conditions requires an arm chair that allows his leg and body to be tilted up to lessen the pain of his legs swelling daily due to is kidney and other medical issues.

name: Small Cabinet
description: Client is living with her husband & 3 children, and they have another child on the way. They have recently moved into a new rental house, and require refurbishing assistance. The family has poor employment stability, and is struggling financially.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Nathania Chua

name: A table of length 4'5
description: A family of two, a son who is the sole breadwinner and the only caregiver to his dementia father needs a table for cooking. The dimension of the table is 4 feet 5 inches in length and 2 feet in width is suitable for their flat.

name: Sliding wardrobe
description: Client is incarcerated. Son is in a community rehab centre and his Ex-wife is living with 14yo daughter. The ex-wife has a stroke and is a single-leg amputee and the 14yo daughter is the primary caregiver. They are looking for a sliding wardrobe which is more suitable for the ex-wife. However, they cannot afford it. Hence it would be helpful for them to receive one! Thank you :)

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Baby Rompers& Dressing Table
description: The family is currently in need of a Hudson 3-Drawer Changer Dresser with Removable Changing Tray and few Baby Boy Rompers. Prefer new items as it is for the kids. The items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's home and please contact us for delivery details. Thank you!

name: Gas stove (2 burners)
description: Client’s current one is spoilt due to wear and tear. Client is a single lady with multiple chronic illness. She is unable to afford a new one and is currently drinking warm water from her heater shower and unable to cook her meals. Would appreciate if someone could buy or donate a gas stove (with 2 gas tops). Client uses government gas.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Shereen Yeo

name: 4'5 Kitchen Cabinet
description: A family of two, a son who is the sole breadwinner and the only caregiver to his dementia father needs a kitchen cabinet for cooking. The dimension of the requested kitchen cabinet is 4 feet 5 inches in length and 2 feet in width.

name: Bicycle
description: Family has low income and hopes to supplement income by working with GrabFood. Preferably new or in mint condition.

name: bicycle
description: Client (F/26) is the sole breadwinner of the household (consisting of her and her parents). She has multiple mental health conditions and has unstable employment. Family is struggling financially, and she requires a bicycle for her to do Grab Food delivery to extra income to support the family's daily expenses. (Melissa)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Bicycle (adult)
description: Family has 2 school-going children. Mother is looking for a bicycle so that she can do some delivery work to supplement the household income as husband is the sole income earner.

name: Laptop for 3yo child from Low Income Family to attend Reading Programme
description: 3yo child with minimal exposure to English is attending a Reading Programmed referred by the FSC. In view of COVID-19's safe measures, the programme has been shift to online platforms, but child and mother have not been able to attend the programme because they do not have a laptop. Family has been facing difficulties making ends meet and are unable to purchase a laptop. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Laptop
description:
Client is currently homeless and is hoping to get a laptop for better access to services and products. He hopes that he can explore other alternative employment options 
(i.e. survey, web designer) as well.
